hero.title: Identity Verification
hero.description: Seamlessly onboard users with bank-grade security. Our 3D Liveness Detection and Smart OCR technology ensure compliance in seconds, not days.

features.title: Advanced KYC Technology
features.description: Our platform combines cutting-edge AI with robust compliance checks to deliver a seamless verification experience.

liveness.name: AI-Powered Liveness Detection
liveness.desc: Our advanced 3D FaceMesh technology ensures the user is physically present, preventing spoofing attacks with real-time motion analysis.

ocr.name: Smart Document OCR
ocr.desc: Instantly recognize and extract data from Passports, ID Cards, and Residence Permits. Our system automatically detects document boundaries and quality.

address.name: Proof of Address Verification
address.desc: Automated utility bill verification ensures compliance with residence requirements. Upload or capture documents directly.

global.name: Global Coverage
global.desc: Support for documents from multiple countries including Azerbaijan, Latvia, Ukraine, and more. Seamlessly verify users worldwide.

security.name: Bank-Grade Security
security.desc: Bank-grade security with advanced device fingerprinting and session analysis to prevent spoofing and fraud.

feedback.name: Real-Time Feedback
feedback.desc: Users receive instant guidance during the process (e.g., "Move Closer", "Hold Still"), ensuring high success rates and a smooth experience.

techSpecs.title: Built for Speed and Security
techSpecs.description: Our infrastructure is designed to handle high volumes of verifications with minimal latency, ensuring your users are verified in seconds, not days.

tensorflow.name: TensorFlow.js
tensorflow.desc: Client-side AI processing for immediate feedback and reduced server load. FaceMesh models run directly in the browser.

secureSessions.name: Secure Sessions
secureSessions.desc: Every verification starts with a unique session token. Includes device intelligence and browser fingerprinting.

mobile.name: Mobile Optimized
mobile.desc: Fully responsive design that works perfectly on mobile devices, utilizing native camera capabilities.

instant.name: Instant Results
instant.desc: Get verification results via API callbacks immediately after the user completes the process.

api.name: RESTful API
api.desc: Easy to integrate REST API with comprehensive documentation and SDKs for major languages.

developer.name: Developer Friendly
developer.desc: Built by developers for developers. Clean code, typed interfaces, and detailed error messages.

retention.name: Data Retention
retention.desc: Configurable data retention policies to meet your specific compliance and privacy requirements.

cloud.name: Cloud Native
cloud.desc: Scalable infrastructure hosted on secure cloud providers with high availability and redundancy.

success.title: Registration Started!
success.description: Your secure session has been created successfully.
success.note: In a production environment, you would be automatically redirected to the verification flow.

form.title: Ready to get started?
form.description: Join thousands of businesses trusting our platform for their identity verification needs. Simple integration, powerful results.
form.errorTerms: You must accept the terms and conditions.

footer.tagline: Next-generation identity verification platform for modern businesses. Secure, fast, and compliant.
